sources.title: A Martial Kind of Men
sources.description:
The rogue Gordey Kabachkov is trying to penetrate science and easily fools numerous "good-natured people" - members of the academic council - and defends a dissertation on ancient Greek myths. After that, Kabachkov supplant the director and takes his place. When the “good people” nevertheless expose him and expel him, a new “rogue” is already marking his place.

Directed by: Karen Shakhnazarov 
Written by: Leonid Zorin 
Music: Mark Minkov
Operator: Vladimir Shevtsik 
Production Designers: Nikolay Polyakov, Konstantin Stepanov 

Starting: Georgy Burkov, Tatyana Vasilyeva, Nikolai Volkov, Vladimir Zeldin, Viktor Sharlakhov, Larisa Pashkova, Yuri Leonidov, Yuri Gusev, Valentin Nikulin, Alexander Safronov, Valentina Telichkina

#kind_men #Shakhnazarov #subtitles #FullMoviesWithEngSubs

metadata.Actors: Sean McKenzie, Rebecca Root, Richard Standing
